name: Michael Kelleher
bio: Michael Kelleher is the author of To Be Sung (Blazevox, 2005) as well as the chapbook Cuba (Phylum, 2002). His poems and essays have appeared in Slope, ecopoetics, The Poetry Project Newsletter, Kiosk, and others. He is the artistic director of the Just Buffalo Literary Center and the literary editor of Artvoice, Buffalo’s alternative weekly.
